title: Microsoft Windows 95 Reboot Chime and Minecraft Soundtrack Inducted Into National Recording Registry
description: BrianFagioli writes: In a move that is sure to make longtime PC users do a double take, the Library of Congress has added two very unexpected sounds to its National Recording Registry. No, it's not another classic rock album or jazz staple. Believe it or not, it's actually the "Reboot Chime" from Windows 95 (that played when the operating system started) and the soundtrack from Minecraft! Read more of this story at Slashdot.
author: msmash
